articles.description: A new study that has seen pilot programs spring up around the world has discovered that dogs can sniff out coronavirus in the sweat of humans.
articles.content: MAISONS-ALFORT, France — While a vaccine for the coronavirus will help stop the pandemic’s spread, finding everyone who may be carrying the virus is still an issue. Luckily, man’s best friend is now … [+4291 chars]
